s.text: In our guidelines we tried to relate the possible benefits of sedation to the basic concerns of palliative care by using it as a reversible therapeutic procedure.
In our guidelines we tried to relate the possible benefits of sedation to the basic concerns of palliative care by using it as a reversible therapeutic procedure.
In the years 2000-2002 patients with more psychological distress had a longer survival time than those with otherwise resistant control of more physical symptoms (Table 3).
